Title: ['Character Selection', 'Check Rules', 'New Characters']
Desc: ['During the check event, select an extra S-Rank Omniframe as the check target.', "If the result is an S-Rank Omniframe, then it's guaranteed to be the S-Rank Omniframe selected for the check.
